languages.text: "Смерть прошептала твое имя, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Ты можешь отказаться от дара, но он навсегда останется твоим. Ибо так предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Ибо так должно случиться. Быть может... время еще не пришло. И позже ты изменишь свое решение".
languages.translation_comment: КИБЕЛЛА ОСТАЕТСЯ В МАСКЕ, портрет не меняется

traits.locale_text: "Смерть прошептала твое имя, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Ты можешь отказаться от дара, но он навсегда останется твоим. Ибо так предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Ибо так должно случиться. Быть может... время еще не пришло. И позже ты изменишь свое решение".

languages.translation_comment: КИБЕЛЛА ОСТАЕТСЯ В МАСКЕ, портрет не меняется

languages.text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."
languages.original_text: "Смерть прошептала твое имя, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Ты можешь отказаться от дара, но он навсегда останется твоим. Ибо так предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Ибо так должно случиться. Быть может... время еще не пришло. И позже ты изменишь свое решение".

traits.locale_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so His Tarot forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you will yet change your decision."
"Death has whispered your name, Enim'{name} von Valancius. You can decline the gift but it will remain yours forever."

"Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so His Tarot forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you will yet change your decision."

"Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so His Tarot forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

"Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

languages.text: « La mort a murmuré votre nom, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Même si vous refusez le cadeau, il restera vôtre à jamais. Car {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré l'a prédit, et le destin en a voulu ainsi. Peut-être l'heure n'est-elle pas encore venue, et vous pouvez encore revenir sur votre décision. »
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

traits.locale_text: « La mort a murmuré votre nom, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Même si vous refusez le cadeau, il restera vôtre à jamais. Car {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré l'a prédit, et le destin en a voulu ainsi. Peut-être l'heure n'est-elle pas encore venue, et vous pouvez encore revenir sur votre décision. »

languages.text: «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Puede rechazar este don, pero será suyo para siempre. Pues así lo ha vaticinado {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, y así se ha decretado. Tal vez no haya llegado aún el momento, y cabe la posibilidad de que se replantee su decisión».
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte ha susurrado su nombre, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Puede rechazar este don, pero será suyo para siempre. Pues así lo ha vaticinado {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, y así se ha decretado. Tal vez no haya llegado aún el momento, y cabe la posibilidad de que se replantee su decisión».

languages.text: “死亡轻唱过你的名字，秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你可以拒绝这份礼物，但这份礼物永远属于你，因为{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}揭示了这样的预兆，这便是祂的安排。或许时机该没有成熟，你还有机会改变心意。”
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

traits.locale_text: “死亡轻唱过你的名字，秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你可以拒绝这份礼物，但这份礼物永远属于你，因为{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}揭示了这样的预兆，这便是祂的安排。或许时机该没有成熟，你还有机会改变心意。”

languages.text: 「死が御身の名前を囁いたのです、ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。贈り物を断ることはできますが、これは永遠にあなたの物です。{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}がそう予言し、そう定められていたのです。もしかすると、その時は来ていないのかもしれません。そして、お考えを変えることになるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

traits.locale_text: 「死が御身の名前を囁いたのです、ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。贈り物を断ることはできますが、これは永遠にあなたの物です。{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}がそう予言し、そう定められていたのです。もしかすると、その時は来ていないのかもしれません。そして、お考えを変えることになるかもしれません」

languages.text: "Der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Ihr mögt das Geschenk verweigern, doch es wird für immer das Eure bleiben." Denn so hat es {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g} prophezeit und so wurde es bestimmt. Vielleicht ist die Zeit noch nicht gekommen und Ihr könnt Eure Entscheidung noch ändern."
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Ihr mögt das Geschenk verweigern, doch es wird für immer das Eure bleiben." Denn so hat es {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g} prophezeit und so wurde es bestimmt. Vielleicht ist die Zeit noch nicht gekommen und Ihr könnt Eure Entscheidung noch ändern."

languages.text: "Ölüm, adını fısıldadı Domin'{name} von Valancius. Reddetsen de bu armağan ebediyen senin olacak. Çünkü {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}O'nun Tarotu{/g} böylesini öngördü ve böylesi emredildi. Belki vaktin henüz gelmemiştir ve kararını hâlâ değiştirebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Death has whispered your name, Domin'{name} von Valancius. You may refuse the gift, but it will remain yours forever. For so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke, and so it was ordained. Perhaps the time has not yet come, and you may well change your decision."
